system.descriptionText:
Either Point Defence or Sentry Mode, switch with +10 Tech-Use (if fail, Jam but lose no ammo. Also sets Target Priority: Infantry, Tank, or Aircraft):
Point Defence: Functions as Permenant Overwatch with 90 Fire Arc.
Sentry: Has Area of Infleunce up to half weapon range. Can Fire in any direction and rolls for initiative as if an NPC.
